properties.Summary: Noise from traffic loud noisy. Noise from traffic is a problem in the city of San Francisco. The city has been hit hard by a series of accidents in recent years.
Intersection unsafe due to reckless driving highspeed cars make this intersection hazardous. Fast vehicles cause danger at this crossing. Add trash cans trash cans please.
Stray animals are a recurring issue here. Excessive stray dogs observed in this area. Stray animals pose safety concerns.

High pavement makes it hard for wheelchair users. Sidewalk is not wheelchair accessible due to high curbs Lack of ramps makes this area inaccessible. Wheelchair users struggle with steep pavements.
